title: 2 Bedroom Home Coming Soon!
posting_body: Use the link below for more details:
Why go with the flow... when you can follow your own current?
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1202 Sq.
Hidden River is a maple shaded enclave of 105 two and three bedroom homes situated within a park-like, brook side setting.
Juanita Creek meanders through Hidden River Townhomes before it flows into nearby Juanita Bay in sparkling Lake Washington.
The townhomes are located at one of Juanita's most convenient intersections.
From its convenient location just west of I-405, routes link Hidden River with quick connections and easy back-roads.
High-tech employment centers such as Microsoft and Nintendo, as well as University of WA/Bothell and Evergreen Medical health complexes are just minutes away.
Even closer is the award-winning Lake Washington school district.
Direct your own headwaters toward workplace and leisure hot-spots in Kirkland with easy access to Redmond, Bellevue, Woodinville and Seattle.
Explore bike trails, bistros, boutiques and wineries!
- Carport or Attached Garage with each home
- Washer and Dryer in every home
Coming from NORTH: Head South on I-405, take exit 22 for NE 160th Street, continue on Juanita Woodinville Way NE, turn left onto 100th Ave NE, Hidden River Townhomes will be on your left.
Head North on I-405, take exit 20B for NE 124th Street (keep left), turn left onto NE 124th Street, turn right onto 100th Ave NE, Hidden River Townhomes will be on your right.
Tuesday and Thursday: 10:00AM-6:00PM Wednesday and Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM
Pet Fee $300 per pet, Pet Deposit $200 per pet, Pet rent $30 a month per cat, $40 a month per Dog.
No weight limit, few breed restrictions apply.
Please Note: Each home comes with either a 1 or 2-car garage or 1 carport space.
Any additional cars must park in our open parking.
Due to parking restrictions, we do not allow more than one vehicle per licensed resident.

Key Words: Juanita, Kirkland, East Side, Juanita beach park, Lake Washington, The village at Totem Lake, Nordstrom Rack, Trader Joes, Whole Foods, Downtown Kirkland, Ulta Beauty, Evergreen Hospital, Bastyr University, Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Boeing, Newly Renovated, Townhomes, Paccar, Public Transit, Lake Washington Technical College, UW Bothell, Woodinville Wineries, Willows Road, Volt, Aerotek, Aerojet Rocketdyne, Lake Washington Institute of Technology, DigiPen Institute of Technology, Oculus Research, Nintendo, T-mobile, Expedia Group
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
